name: SARS Coronavirus 2 RNA, Qualitative
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to qualitative detection of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in various specimens (serum, plasma, respiratory, or unspecified).),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in various specimens (serum, plasma, respiratory, or unspecified).),(Exclusion Criteria: )
